name: Fruit Size Constraint
message: Apples must have a size of 50%

name: Bowl Movement Constraint
message: Bowl must move right when right arrow key is pressed.

message: Bowl must move right with a speed of 10 when right arrow key is pressed.

message: Apple must fall down in steps of size 5.

name: Banana Falling Details
message: Banana must fall down in steps of size 7.
